reviews.review: One of the best games I ever played.

I really like this game. The main mechanics are great, characters are funny, the story is well written, and the graphics are amazing, even for this day and age.♥

Ein mega gutes Spiel, mit interessanten und abwechslungsreichen Puzzlen. Kann man nur jedem empfehlen, der Rätselspiele mag. Meiner Meinung ist der zweite Teil sogar besser, als der erste, aber man sollte beide spielen, um die ganze Story zu verstehen.

不得不说，从关卡、玩法设计能学到很多。

This game is a masterpiece. Great intuitive level design, interesting characters that come to life through the amazing voice acting, impressive visuals, this game has it all. I enjoyed every second of it.
Игра реально хорошая. Я потратил час на прохождение одного лвла!!!!!!!!!
这是我到目前为止，玩过的最好的双人合作游戏。既锻炼思维方式，又考验手速，分工配合。晕3d的要慎重点。有时候空间方向感属实找不好。hhh
very good it make me big brain like my brain was little now its swole

Played this game many times from other people's accounts, but never got the full experience.  Finally bought it and it did not disappoint at all.  The story opens up so much more about the first game and has fully fleshed out characters.  Despite not being physically present and kind of an off to the side storyline, Cave Johnson ended up being my favorite.  The single player mode is worth every penny by itself, but the co-op and custom test modes give access to unlimited entertainment.  The mechanics are so intuitive and the puzzles are so challenging I'm willing to bet my own mother would enjoy it.  10 out of 10.  If you haven't checked it out, what are you even doing?  Go test for aperture! Do it now! I WILL BURN YOUR HOUSE WITH LEMONS AND FIND Y-
Portal et Portal 2 sont LES jeux de réflexion ultimes. Ce sont aussi des aventures passionnantes et pleines d'esprit.
perfect game to play with your mates

If I had to pick one game from valve, it would have to be Portal 2. I love this game so much, all of the characters, and how time consuming it is. It's the best puzzle game i have ever played in my life and there won't ever be anything like it. Totally recommend it at full price or when it's on sale. Just please, give it a shot, you won't regret it.

Such an innovative game, truly ahead of its time. I understand I'm late to this, but it took me around ~60hrs to beat Portal 2, and took me less than two hours to beat the original Portal. It really shows how much time valve spent making this game. I don't think the game is perfect, however I found less bugs then I did really great semi-challenging entertaining gameplay. I give it a 8.5/10.
Almost better than the first one. Definitely recommended.
first played this six years ago its lived in my brain rent free ever since
Super fun and sometimes makes you actually think
Amazing game. Great puzzles and great humor.  My only complaint is there hasn't been a portal 3 yet.
God damnit if you don't own this game you have failed as a person,
This was one of the very first games i finished on my own and honestly I cant reccomend this enough i love this game and if you like puzzles it's essential
